title: Implement FallbackPlanner Stub
description: Implement the FallbackPlanner as a stub module that supports safe fallback maneuvers (ask clarifying question, refuse politely, switch to text summary, escalate to human, offer to send email/link). Integrate with LaneArbitrator and Lane C for triggering fallback patterns.
acceptance_criteria: FallbackPlanner supports all specified fallback maneuvers as stub functions
FallbackPlanner can be invoked by LaneArbitrator on policy cancel
Fallback events are logged in AuditTrail
